Back to Johann Sebastian Bach

Johann Sebastian Bach

Partita no. 1 in B-flat major, BWV 825

published 1726

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP page 1] · [IMSLP page 2]

Total duration: 17' 30"

  • 1. Praeludium
  • 2. Allemande
  • 3. Corrente
  • 4. Sarabande
  • 5. Menuet I – Menuet II – Menuet I
  • 6. Giga

Recommended editions

  • Neue Bach-Ausgabe (Bärenreiter) · V, 1 · BA 5046-01 · Erster Teil der Klavierübung · ed. Richard Jones
  • Associated Board · Partitas Nos. I–III · ed. Walter Emery
  • Bärenreiter · BA 5152 · Sechs Partiten / Erster Teil der Klavierübung · ed. Richard Jones
  • Bärenreiter · BA 5247 · Sechs Partiten / Erster Teil der Klavierübung · ed. Richard Jones
  • Henle · HN 518 · Sechs Partiten · ed. Ullrich Scheideler [including further version of mov. 4]
  • Henle · HN 519 · Sechs Partiten · ed. Ullrich Scheideler [including further version of mov. 4]
  • Henle · HN 1518 · Sechs Partiten · ed. Ullrich Scheideler [including further version of mov. 4]
  • Peters · EP 11503 · Clavier-Büchlein für Johann Christian Bach · ed. Christoph Wolff [mov. 5]
  • Wiener Urtext · UT 50192 · 6 Partiten · ed. Klaus Engler

1. Praeludium

Duration: 2'

Difficulty: 3

2. Allemande

Duration: 3'

Difficulty: 2.5

3. Corrente

Duration: 3'

Difficulty: 3

4. Sarabande

Duration: 4' 30"

Difficulty: 2.5

5. Menuet I – Menuet II – Menuet I

Duration: 3'

Difficulty: 2

6. Giga

Duration: 2'

Difficulty: 2.5
